subject: Basketball (College)
Prostitution
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: Louisville Coach Rick Pitino said Friday that the N.C.A.A. had not interviewed him about an escort’s book containing allegations of sex parties at a players’ dormitory.
snippet: Louisville Coach Rick Pitino said Friday that the N.C.A.A. had not interviewed him about an escort’s book containing allegations of sex parties at a players’ dormitory.
